There is a outcome called destiny, there is a pain, called continuous nine to commence.longchamp le pliage Fireworks is easy to cold, the personnel, who can understand my heart? Who is able to read falling leaves sorrow?

Walking in the cold Street, quietly trying to look with hearts full of heart, acting no clue.longchamp handbags On the streets, of the yellow street lights have lit beside the shuttle over the crowd, I couldn't see their expression, do not know what they are thinking, but, they are doing the same thing--to go home ... ...

On the head, under the leaves floating, I have come to understand that autumn has quietly come to the human world. Years have gone off like water most of the year. Boomerang half down under, hold in your hands, looked at its face Cang sang, I seem to see my fly away youth. I wanted to stop being blowing evening breeze, hope that it is not torn full of yellowing of the leaves of the tree, so that they can branch to stay more time, and I can do about it. I know that the go or do you want to go, even begging is unable to retain.

If you can go back in time, I will let the stories go. Those good times spent together, those days of sightseeing by bike, those young innocent and carefree youth, do you remember?If time can turn the clock back,longchamp le pliage handbags I can meet you? I can happily spend the most beautiful in their teens? If this life is not in love with you, that is how a landscape? If life does not meet you, nice! Falling leaves drifting is not a tree does not retain, but trees can do. Because it knows that if it tears, and my knees'll leaf leave;

However, the tree still don't understand, why the leaves fall. It is only that the leaf is inattentive, is of stone, because it leaves is not sad, because the moment of falling leaves and leave a drop of tear.

Leaves no tears, does not mean that it has no scars; it did not cry, does not mean that it is not sad; it did not tell, does not mean that it has no voice. In fact, at its heart, is how it broke. After all, it depends on the tree side by side with for so long, its trees full of infinite gratitude and love. Although didn't want to go, it would have to go, because the wind blow desperately, constant pressure to it, its thin continuous rocking of the body How to withstand windy? In the wind under the urging of her mother-in-law, it reluctantly left. But it did not want to look and feel bad for the tree to see its sad, retain, and movement, enchanting posture, swirling, lightly and to go, it would rather let the trees get it wrong all my life!

Life, long or short. For the leaves, from the moment of falling branches, its end of life even if, because of its youth, its heart was left on the tree. But it will not be finished, it turned into mud in the spring, take care of next year's economic downturn. Leaves understand that they came to the world's great mission, to leave the tree, leaving the tree, simply in order to better realize the value of life!

However, I don't want your life full of regret and regret it, I prefer to be a regret, not miss regret.

You worry written all over your face, and I totally understand. You know my character, going to do once you have decided, even being hit was badly beaten, battered, still looking back, bump your head with the wall. Just because my work, you don't love me, you don't belong to me, I do not blame you, simply stated a fact, I was not really suitable for you, you are a thorough the end of housewives, statements can you hear are from, can be there right by your side at all times.

I'm glad I was leaves, can quietly leave, without a trace of nostalgia, just leave, so wouldn't face, faint eye see you sad. Unfortunately, I am not leaves, I won't become leaves, I was man, I was thinking, feeling person, I am a woman with kid gloves, I did not break things. Perhaps it is my weakness, to numerous injuries to my broken heart.

This time, I have firm their conviction, not to have any worry, I do not want to hurt each other's hearts more, give more and more sad, unresolved hurt more and more deep. Because, our story is destined to the absence of a satisfactory outcome from the start. Despite I know I of heart in drops blood, despite I has see has you disappointed of eyes, despite I know is I on can't you on I of really, but, I really of don't want to on you said what sorry, I don't let a sentence "sorry" drowned has all of "I love you"; I don't let pain continuous commence to erosion with each other of heart. Because in my heart, you're still so important!

Perhaps, may wrongly think that the leaves of the tree for life, will never to read falling leaves all the loss and sorrow; or maybe, someday, will fully understand leaves a decision tree.

Perhaps, you will hate me, but I believe that, one day, you read my mind, you will fully understand what I do; maybe then, you might say: "then I support you and love you! ”

Enjoy a quiet people, heard not the distant wail of a whistle, maybe forever but the noise of the city, the troubles of the world. A man, quietly, sitting in front of the window, and memories.

In the familiar city, gloomy autumn Street left circulation wind, cool light, silky rain curtain, jumping. Cherished thoughts of debris just as intermittent rain lines continue for ever. Knees and sitting in the window sill, to the glass gently halitus, hands on in a thin layer of water vapor carefully writing down names, familiar.

On Windows, stupefy flashed a innocent smile and seem to feel their Yingying laughter coming from, even though we know that, one day, sooner or later we will spen, but parting seems to be come a bit too early.

Accustomed in every time and in your "rush", but more than once to shoot each other shoulder their encouragement. Little encouragement, so I took a step, confident.

You say, three years away. Then as if the whole school, whole world are full of sad parting, I see have been suffused with tears in the eyes of each other. New school, we did together, but God did not let us in class. But, you say, lesser, never mind, I will come to you every day. Until one day, I said, let us back to junior high school. You nodded. Once memories of school leaving only empty pleasures and gorgeous, afterglow slowly devour memories of teaching building, dust the furniture we have witnessed, kapok silently spills outside the window leaf carved their own rings ... ... Those who seem to have gone live together, remembering once, in tears.

Remember the night of new year's day, we ride home, remove your window in the water vapor, longchamp handbags lesser, happy new year, Happy New Year, small ya come on! Window places, and I also wrote, Nana, a happy new year. You're like my sister, gave me a lot, I said, Miss Nana go! Thank you! Car, vehicles brimming with warmth.

After the Division of Arts and Sciences, you have chosen, I do so, but still are not in the same class, still, go to school with school. You say, lesser, not to cry, sad when I lean on my shoulder. Gut wrenching pain, I couldn't help but cry. Nana, loving you. Forever.

You're a wallow in the Red dust, how many bustling magnificent confused eyes, how much fame and fortune I do not horses. Not for who it hurts, I was a grain of dust in the world, vast in the universe. My tears will only fall in my blood thin chest.

There are millions of creatures. But who can read another lonely voice?

You and I are alone, lonely death.

August Moon Festival, what should I do, makes this Lonesome solitary clear autumn does not feel banal. I am Buddhist people, but I did not understand Buddhism, the only remaining Buddhist knowledge only know a man called shijiamoni, must love his unfeeling, his great love selflessly, then thousands of years later he is still a celebrity, or a great man. Faith love and hate this is not what I can say, if one has in mind are slim, like sea of duckweed when beliefs are his relatives, his lover. I am a very sensitive person, so I have a lonely heart. I'm a loving romantic person, so at night huddled in the cold was the quilt, tears of sorrow, broke down in tears. On these occasions, I believe the Buddha, he can come to me no longer lonely land, such as heaven, like fairyland.

Tianmen mountain. This place is one of my great love. Love the extent to which it can be said that a margin of the preexistence. Every time I go back I will go to the Temple of 1500 meters above sea level on worship, but I love more is climbing on the cliffs of the kind above. At that moment, cheeks boiling, is a tangle of pain into physical and psychological pain that cannot be speech. Live hard, love of impermanent, natural scale, this allow me sorrowful tears.

XV is the first since autumn cloudy that day, suspended in the sky was leaden clouds, ropes, the stands are likely to tilt down one long ready to wind and rain. Insists on is my woman so resolutely customary character, most of the time I love a man that cannot be accepted and understood things, mad more and more happy, more happy the more crazy. When close to the peak, steep cable car between a violent shaking, violent wind came in through the glass cracks drilled, Hu La La blowing on your face, saw the head of ropeway wire thin thin, is mentioned in the throat. The most direct, face their own death.longchamp le pliage handbags Just like a man is a man holding down the head into cold water, magnificent in your heart, but unable to breathe, watched slowly lose the light and sound. At that time, appears Golden illusion, illusion of beautiful quiet. This illusion is death. If I'm over more than 1000 meters high hill there are clouds white fog, to rapidly fall modalities grips to the ground, went to die, I'd like to. Unfortunately, I was a coward after all, need to fatal accident at a point in time just in time to get what they want.

I love death just as I desire for health. This is not at all contradictory.longchamp handbags All very beautiful things are contradictory. Just like we will never know the distance between your body and soul.
